-e ---

𓏒 ⋍ 𒌑 ≈ 𒋰𒐈𒋰 prado "pasture" 𓇐 𓇏 ☑
𓏒 ⋍ 𒌑 ≈ 𒋰𒐈𒋰 bread 𓏒 𓏳 𓏥 ! 𓏒 ⋍ dough / bread

𓊪 𓂝 𓏏 𓏒 | a cake or loaf | pꜤt / brt : part Brot bread ++++ phanᵈ pan panini 𓊪 𓅮 𓄿 𓂧 𓏒 | flat-loaf | Fladen Brot > food 𓊪 𓅮 𓆓 𓏐 Fladen (a loaf )
𓊪 𓅮 𓏏 𓏗 oblate!? ( 𓏗 cake, loaf used in offerings)

𓏏 𓏐 𓏳 𓏥
𓏐 𓏳 𓏥
𓏏 𓏐 𓀭 (divinity) Thoth (god)
𓏏 𓅓 𓇾||a type of bread
𒃻 NINDA (Sumerian, Luwian, Hittite!)

𓏏 𓏐 tarıg "bread" > Teig, dough
𓏏 𓏐 𓏒 𓏥 turpan 𔓐 #PANIS bread /turp/ᵒⁿ
𓏏 𓏐 𓏒 𓏥 σῖτος sîtos "bread" (weakened s)
𓏏 𓏐 𓏒 𓏥 teʾūtu 𒋼𒀪𒌑𒌅 te-ʾu-ú-tu "food"
